title: volibear jungle
body: should volibear be an ad or ap jungle, i see quite alot of people jungle ap and also quite a lot of people hungle ad and im not exactly sure whether to try ap out if ad works well anyway. feedback would be appreciated

replies.body:
I think he's typically built tank.

I don't really know anyone who plays ap voli, as his AP scalings aren't that great, and since his w gives bonus attack speed he synergises better with AD.

Building the echos jungle item on him might be viable for a bit of extra burst and more importantly the move speed, but I don't imagine building any other AP would be worthwhile in most circumstances.
Usually you build full tank on volibear.

Volibear builds primarily health with resistances.  

A decent build would be something along the lines of:
[Boots] {{item:1401}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3075}}

If you ever need a starting point, champion.gg and probuilds.net are good resources for champion builds.
